profile.intro: Hi! I am Marco, back-end web developer, runner, hiker, and many other things.
profile.description: I love create solutions with tecnology and this is the reason I choose this way. I like reading fiction books and non-fiction books. Also hike and run in the nature.
profile.studies: I studied at a Bootcamp where I learned Front-End and Back-End. I specialized in Back-End taking courses and self-taught. I am currently taking a Bootcamp on Computer Science to get a better understanding of this field. I also continue to deepen my knowledge with Node.js and some of its frameworks. All this in order to be able to contribute to a team in a better way.
profile.greetings: Welcome! Hope you enjoy my work!

proyect-1.tecnologies: Tecnologies: NodeJs, Express, TypeScript, MongoDB, Mongoose, Swagger.
proyect-1.description: This wallet app is a team work were we can register a user and doing other activities. Read more on Repository.

proyect-2.tecnologies: Tecnologies: NodeJs, Express, Postgres, Sequelize, Swagger.
proyect-2.description: This project is about films directors, we can create, read, update and delete the directors. Read more on Back-End Repository.
